original_title: Inside Jaguar: Making a Million Pound Car
overview: Only 12 original Jaguar Lightweight E-Types were made in 1963 and now their craftsmen are building six more, each at a cost of £1 million and bound for a specially-selected customer.  With exclusive access to Jaguar as their craftsmen create six new Lightweight E-Types, costing over £1 million each and going to specially-chosen customers, Mark Evans seeks to understand the world of classic cars. He meets dedicated car collectors and attends important events in the classic car calendar to discover what makes these cars so special and desirable.
title: Inside Jaguar: Making a Million Pound Car
